contest-event.event-date: Oct. 19, 1968 D National Mineworkers (Championship Section) National Mineworkers (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest National Mineworkers Contest national-mineworkers-championship-section This contest became the Butlins Mineworkers Contest in 2003. Championship Tam O'Shanter's Ride [Wright] Winter Gardens (Empress Ballroom), Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK 11 bands competed. 7th annual contest. Feb. 6, 2011, 8:50 p.m. Oct. 19, 2015, 8:35 a.m. 1 Grimethorpe Colliery Band George Thompson 2 Lochgelly Band Robert Oughton 3 Markham and District Band Don Hendy 4 Carlton Main Frickley Colliery Band Jack Atherton Unknown Result New Tredegar Cornelius Buckley Unknown Result Creswell Colliery Band Denis Smith Unknown Result Wansbeck's Ashington Colliery Band J.
